about_the_game:
Give your male party members the makeover they deserve with the Another World Hero Generator 3 for MZ pack! Gee-kun-soft is here with another set of 40 MZ-style generator pieces, perfect for giving your heroes a sleek haircut, new snazzy set of clothes, and some expressive eyes! 2 AccA, 3 AccB, 20 Clothing, 5 Eyes, 5 Front Hair, and 5 Rear Hair generator parts offer up a variety of armors and outfits along with accessories to give each of your characters unique looks or have them change as the story progresses.

And don’t forget how much the right eyes and accessories can take a character to the next level! So pick up the Another World Hero Generator 3 for MZ pack and fill your party and game world with powerful warriors and helpful men who are looking their best!


Includes:

・Clothes ("fantasy" style) = 20
・Accessories x 5
・Eyes = 5 sets
・Front Hair = 5 Male
・Rear Hair = 5 Male

Compatible with RPG Maker MZ
